term.title: enantiomerically pure

item.text: A sample all of whose molecules have (within limits of detection) the same chirality sense. Use of homochiral as a synonym is strongly discouraged.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2207 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
